p.s: Maybe this E-Maile-mail is a little bit unexpected but I just couldn't stop thinking about what you said about student exchanges.
I'm really convinced that going abroad at our age is very important but also a special experience.
I care about you and I hope that I can change your mind so you don't miss out on that.
As I just said, a student exchange is everything but a waste of time like you said.
You don't miss out on anything in school, because you go to school like you would do at home, the only difference being the new language, people and country.
You get to know a lot about new cultures and people and get to live a life that is completlycompletely different from yours for a year or a half.
I always thought of you as an open-minded and intelligent person.
So I think that an exchange would be just the right thing for you.
I think life just gets boring when you do the same things every day, every week 24/7.
Some people that went abroad say, that when you come back, you see everything different, but in a good way.
All in all I think that student exchanges are the best opportunity to live your life fully at our age.
I wish you the best and stay healthy,
